message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Hopefully we can find a way to be more equal in the future.
You took 90%, I'll take 80% this time. Let's see if you'll accept this time
I understand you want a bigger share, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Let's split it 70/30 this time. We both get more than in the last round.
You're still giving me too much of a disadvantage. I'll take 60% this time. Can you meet me in the middle?
Okay, let's try a 55/45 split. I'm willing to give you more, but I need to ensure I get a fair share too.
I'm not budging on 60% yet. You're still getting a good deal, but I need more. This is my last offer before I walk away
